# unregisterDraggedTypes()

**Instance Method**

Unregisters the window as a possible destination for dragging operations.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func unregisterDraggedTypes()
```

## Dragging Items

- **drag(_:at:offset:event:pasteboard:source:slideBack:)**: Begins a dragging session.
- **registerForDraggedTypes(_:)**: Registers a set of pasteboard types that the window accepts as the destination of an image-dragging session.

items.description: Registers a set of pasteboard types that the window accepts as the destination of an image-dragging session.
items.name: registerForDraggedTypes(_:)
